snippet: Helle Thorning-Schmidt, the prime minister-elect, said Sunday that she had agreed with political allies to form a three-party coalition government.
lead_paragraph: Helle Thorning-Schmidt, the prime minister-elect, said Sunday that she had agreed with political allies to form a three-party coalition government.

headline.main: Denmark’s New Premier Announces Coalition Agreement
headline.seo: Denmark’s New Premier Announces Coalition Agreement
